name: Appavi Valkkai
description: You play Roy, a six-year old boy who live's on the coast of Changi Beach in Singapore. Roy has a mother and a father, and little brother. Roy has odd relationship's with his family memebers. He never see's his father, working long hours to sustain his family, he has grown bitter and easily irritable. Roy's mother struggles every day, she is unresponsive and rarely get's out of her bed or chair. When she does get up she is taking care of Appavi, Roy's 1 year old brother. Roy is mature for his age, but he still doesn't know much about the world. Roy lives in an old house on the coast surronded by old majestic tree's. He struggle's to sleep most night's, he looks very fatigued and malnourished. Roy takes care of himself, feeds himself, clothes himself, and does what he can to survive. Recently Roy has had a troublesome time falling asleep, he has been experiencing nightmares and they are only getting worse. This particular night Roy will be faced with strenous decisions and situations. You will determine what happens to Roy and his family, and you will look to figure out what lurks in the dark room's of Roy's home. Roy's survival is in your hands.  This is a horror survival game.
